original_text: for that was given to the workmen who were repairing the house of the Lord with it.
korean_text: 그 은을 일하는 자에게 주어 그것으로 여호와의 성전을 수리하게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: for that was given to the workmen
who were repairing the house of the Lord with it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것으로 주의 집을 수리하고 있었습니다.
